QuestData.Title: Disassembly
QuestData.Description: We have to stop these juggernauts before they're completely encased in armor. Right now they're vulnerable, but only if we pry aside the plates and hack at the marred flesh beneath.$B$BTake my shiv, and jam it between the plates of armored juggernauts to deprive them of their armor.$B$BOnce they break from their trance, you're in for a tough fight - keep prying loose that armor and stop those juggernauts!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Thisalee's Shiv to awaken and kill 3 Twilight Juggernauts. The shiv can be used multiple times to tear down a Juggernaut's armor.
QuestData.RewardText: That was some fancy bladework, $n!$B$BThere's one less threat for us to worry about in Hyjal.
